headline: 2 Reasons to Watch BR and 1 to Stay Cautious
summary: Over the past six months, Broadridge’s stock price fell to $219.37. Shareholders have lost 6.6% of their capital, which is disappointing considering the S&P 500 has climbed by 10.6%. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
